alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 10 at 11:52AM PST until December 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Above 3000 feet will see 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Methow, Winthrop, Conconully, Plain, Mazama, Holden Village, Twisp, Leavenworth, Stehekin, Stevens Pass, and Loup Loup Pass. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
